name: Find Rycover
description:
The Game

I made it for a Dead By Daylight Twitchstreamer called Rycover.
You have to find and click on the face Rycover to get Points.

Rules

If you click on the Giraffe Gavin you will lose your multiplier and get -10 points
But if you click on Rycovers Face you will get 10 * multiplier points!

Other

Also it's my first time with working with sounds and Music
Have much fun and tell me what you think about it in the Comments ^w^

Rycovers Twitchlink: [TwitchTV]
Rycovers Voices: [TwitchClip] Music From: [Youtube]
